text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 32.9175px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 32.9175px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 32.9175px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player rolls Perception + Empathy (difficulty 8); each success indicates how
much of the subject’s aura the character sees and understands (see the table
below). A botch indicates a false or erroneous interpretation. The Storyteller
may wish to make this roll, thus keeping the player in the dark as to just how
good (or bad) the character’s interpretation is.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: In certain circumstances, use of this power requires a die roll: for a normal
Perception roll (the Storyteller may reduce the difficulty by the character’s
Auspex rating), to notice a subject using Obfuscate (see p. 166), or to perceive a

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 21.945px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 21.945px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 21.945px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: start; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 14.2643px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 14.2643px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 14.2643px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
